segments.text: Morning , Zina . Just wanted to say thanks again !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Hi , Vince . Thanks for stopping by . How's the work coming along for the online auction ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , yeah . I'm glad you mentioned that . I think we need to hire somebody new to manage it .

segments.text: I think he's got too much on his plate .
